text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== On January 21, 1986, Hamada debuted for the Japan national team against India. She played two games for Japan in 1986. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 1986 2 0 Total 2 0 ==References== Category:Living people Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:1949 births Category:Japan international footballers
title: Shoko Hamada
